languages.text: "Тот, кого я люблю, сейчас не с нами, но мое сердце все равно принадлежит ему. Его зовут Соломон Антар".
"The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."
languages.original_text: "Тот, кого я люблю, сейчас не с нами, но мое сердце все равно принадлежит ему. Его зовут Соломон Антар".

traits.locale_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

languages.text: "Mein Liebster ist nicht bei uns, aber mein Herz gehört ihm dennoch. Sein Name ist Solomorne Anthar."
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Liebster ist nicht bei uns, aber mein Herz gehört ihm dennoch. Sein Name ist Solomorne Anthar."

languages.text: « L'homme que j'aime n'est pas parmi nous actuellement, mais mon cœur lui appartient tout de même. Il se nomme Solomorne Anthar. »
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: « L'homme que j'aime n'est pas parmi nous actuellement, mais mon cœur lui appartient tout de même. Il se nomme Solomorne Anthar. »

languages.text: “我心爱的人目前不在我们身边，但我的心始终属于他。他的名字叫索罗蒙·安萨。”
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: “我心爱的人目前不在我们身边，但我的心始终属于他。他的名字叫索罗蒙·安萨。”

languages.text: «La persona a la que amo no está ahora con nosotros, pero mi corazón le pertenece igualmente. Su nombre es Solomorne Anthar».
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: «La persona a la que amo no está ahora con nosotros, pero mi corazón le pertenece igualmente. Su nombre es Solomorne Anthar».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}が愛する人は今ここにいないが、それでも{mf|俺|私}の心は彼のものだ。彼の名前はソロモーン・アンサールだ」
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}が愛する人は今ここにいないが、それでも{mf|俺|私}の心は彼のものだ。彼の名前はソロモーン・アンサールだ」

languages.text: Sevdiğim, şu anda yanımızda olmasa da kalbim hâlâ ona ait. Adı Solomorne Anthar."
languages.original_text: "The one I love is not with us now, but my heart belongs to him nonetheless. His name is Solomorne Anthar."

traits.locale_text: Sevdiğim, şu anda yanımızda olmasa da kalbim hâlâ ona ait. Adı Solomorne Anthar."
